statements.select:
SELECT T.BIN_GUID, T.BIN_NO, CASE WHEN T.IO_TYPE = 'I' THEN '入库' WHEN T.IO_TYPE = 'O' THEN '出库' WHEN T.IO_TYPE = 'C' THEN '盘库修改' END IO_TYPE, T.CREATION_DATE, T.PALLET_NO, ISNULL(T1.MATER_NO,T2.MATER_NO) MATER_NO, ISNULL(T1.MATER_NAME,T2.MATER_NAME) MATER_NAME, CASE WHEN T.FINISH_FLAG IS NULL OR T.FINISH_FLAG = '_' THEN '正常' ELSE T.FINISH_FLAG END FINISH_FLAG FROM Z50_WBS_BIN T LEFT JOIN WBS_PACKAGE_DATA T1 ON T1.PACKAGE_GUID = T.PACKAGE_GUID LEFT JOIN Z50_WBS_PACKAGE_DATA T2 ON T2.PACKAGE_GUID = T.PACKAGE_GUID
T.IO_TYPE like '%'+#where.IO_TYPE#+'%'
T.PALLET_NO like '%'+#where.PALLET_NO#+'%'
T.BIN_NO like '%'+#where.BIN_NO#+'%'
T.CREATION_DATE >=#where.BTIME#
T.CREATION_DATE <= 1+#where.ETIME#
order by t.creation_date desc

SELECT T.BIN_GUID, T.BIN_NO, CASE WHEN T.IO_TYPE = 'I' THEN '入库' WHEN T.IO_TYPE = 'O' THEN '出库' WHEN T.IO_TYPE = 'C' THEN '盘库修改' END IO_TYPE, T.CREATION_DATE, T.PALLET_NO, ISNULL(T1.MATER_NO,T2.MATER_NO) MATER_NO, ISNULL(T1.MATER_NAME,T2.MATER_NAME) MATER_NAME, CASE WHEN T.FINISH_FLAG IS NULL OR T.FINISH_FLAG = '_' THEN '正常' ELSE T.FINISH_FLAG END FINISH_FLAG FROM Z50_WBS_BIN T LEFT JOIN WBS_PACKAGE_DATA T1 ON T1.PACKAGE_GUID = T.PACKAGE_GUID LEFT JOIN Z50_WBS_PACKAGE_DATA T2 ON T2.PACKAGE_GUID = T.PACKAGE_GUID
T.BIN_GUID = #where.BIN_GUID#
